title: Voice Change
body: I'm a player in LAS ,but I don't like the announcer 's voice in spanish or champions speaking in spanish. I just want Riot can let us change the language as in EU, because I like it in english or japanese. Thanks.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, changing the language to one that isn't supported in your region isn't an option in the Client. If you'd like to suggest this as a feature, feel free to post it on the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where suggestions posts can be found.

If you need help with anything else, let me know!
